allow: Bash(# Cr√©er le fichier JSON d''abord echo ''{""email"": ""test@helixone.com"", ""password"": ""TestPass123#"", ""username"": ""testuser""}'' curl -s -X POST http://localhost:8000/auth/register \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d @/tmp/register.json)

Bash(# Cr√©er un nouvel utilisateur echo ''{""email"": ""crypto_test@helixone.com"", ""password"": ""CryptoTest123#"", ""username"": ""cryptotest""}'' curl -s -X POST http://localhost:8000/auth/register \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -d @/tmp/register.json)

Bash(# Sauvegarder le token TOKEN=""eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoiMWE5NzJlNTgtNDgyYy00MGY3LWFiY2ItMTFjN2RiOTAwMjQ1IiwiZW1haWwiOiJjcnlwdG9fdGVzdEBoZWxpeG9uZS5jb20iLCJleHAiOjE3Njc3MDYzNzZ9.M27WDIz9EqYJdfjCZjIl8z30-YDyI_FeoEnEVwQaWak"" echo ""=== TEST 1: Cr√©er config crypto ==="" echo ''{""bybit_testnet"": true, ""default_risk_level"": ""moderate"", ""max_exposure_pct"": 50.0}'' curl -s -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/crypto/config \\ -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\ -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" \\ -d @/tmp/crypto_config.json)
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "=== TEST 3: TSMOM Analysis BTC ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "=== TEST 4: TSMOM Analysis ETH ===")

Bash(TOKEN="eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoiMWE5NzJlNTgtNDgyYy00MGY3LWFiY2ItMTFjN2RiOTAwMjQ1IiwiZW1haWwiOiJjcnlwdG9fdGVzdEBoZWxpeG9uZS5jb20iLCJleHAiOjE3Njc3MDYzNzZ9.M27WDIz9EqYJdfjCZjIl8z30-YDyI_FeoEnEVwQaWak" echo "=== TEST 5: Ajouter BTC √† la watchlist ===" echo '{""symbol"": ""BTC"", ""notes"": ""Analyse TSMOM""}' curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/crypto/watchlist"  -H "Content-Type: application/json"  -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"  -d @/tmp/watchlist.json)
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "=== TEST 6: R√©cup√©rer la watchlist ===")
